excerpt: "The latest convergence of artificial intelligence (AI) and retinal diagnosis has given a new hope to those at risk of diabetic retinopathy. Sankara Eye Foundation and Singapore-based Leben Care have deployed a comprehensive retina risk assessment software - Netra."
